Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@CM.name: showCaptureButton()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Show the capture button. Should be called when onboarding is dismissed.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Hide the fileImportTip. Should be called when onboarding is presented.
